metadata.title: CVE-2019-16869 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Netty before 4.1.42.Final mishandles whitespace before the colon in HTTP headers (such as a "Transfer-Encoding : chunked" line), which leads to HTTP request smuggling. It was discovered that Netty has HTTP request smuggling vulnerability. A remote attacker could use it to extract sensitive information.

criterions.comment: netty package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:4.1.33-3').
